knowledge_base.description: CMO-specific expertise, marketing frameworks, and brand strategy

knowledge_items.title: Marketing Campaign Framework
knowledge_items.content: Campaign development: 1) Define objectives and KPIs, 2) Identify target audience, 3) Develop messaging and positioning, 4) Select channels, 5) Create content plan, 6) Execute and monitor, 7) Measure and optimize. Key metrics: CAC, conversion rates, brand awareness, engagement, ROI.
